text_block_list.text: It was an unimaginable time.

When the 3 bodies overlapped each other, aiming for the goal, at 
that moment we thought it would be nice if time stopped.

As the fate of the 1st class star inscribed in her name stood in 
the lead and when her blue competition clothes first crossed the 
goal line, it was as if time came to an end.
The name of the star is Admire Vega.
I'm running toward the end of the goal, I wonder why.
Forever and Forever, I wanted to run in this time together.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
The classic front is about to begin. The “SatsukiShou” which is 
the 1st round, is right around the corner.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
It is the appearance of “BNW” which currently occupies the 
numbers 1, 2 and 3 in the popularity charts in the previous races 
and is attracting the most attention now!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahh… I'm so nervous that my body became itchy…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Not having the usual noisy Ticket is making me nervous too!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Take a deep breath… It's good to slowly take a deep breath.

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: ～～Taking a deep breath～～.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
Well then let's start the press conference with one of the Horse 
Girls who will be competing in the “SatsukiShou”.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
It is said that you 3 girls are good friends, but have you ever 
thought about having a race together?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I have been talking about wanting to run together 
since I entered the school. so I'm looking forward 
to seeing that time finally come.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Eh～ the same as Hayahide said.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Well, me too! I will take what Hayahide said please!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Oh, you guys…

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
You are being called “BNW” and are currently attracting attention 
around the world. So from now on you have to show your enthusiasm 
for running on the classic front.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: This time you guys have to say something first…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ticket, you are up…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Me first…!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uh, Uh… Please look forward to the race of “BWH”!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: This is the three-size measurement…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaa～～ I got it wrong～～!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It was the first time I had a press conference 
that ended up like that.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well, it's just like Ticket, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Remembering it now makes me embarrassed～～!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Wow! it's BNW!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: I saw the press conference! Tickezou-san nice one!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That wasn't on purpose!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text:
In the last “Yayoi Prize!” You were amazing! 
I became a fan of yours Tickezou-san!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Really!? Thank you! I'll show you my win 
in the “SatsukiShou” so leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Hey, if you don't mind could I get your autographs!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: Ah, me too please!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, you 2 don't mind right!? I've finally 
gotten used to my autographs lately!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahh～, I wrote it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Sigh, it finally calmed down. I wouldn't have thought that the 
crowd would swarm at once.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Even so, as expected of the Number 1 in popularity. Didn't you 
write your autographs until the end of the day?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm both happy and embarrassed…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But, there are over 10 million fans coming to the Derby every 
year, right? I have to do my best so that I can write my 
autographs more smoothly!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Don't tell me you are planning 
to sign for all 10 million fans?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Of course I know it's impossible, but the feeling 
is. I also have press conferences, but I want to respond 
properly to the people who support me.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
For the sign you can't get, I'll be 
happy to show you a great race!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Haha, its' a good thing coming from you.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe… right! Why don't we take print sticker photos together?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
From now on, the classic race will continue and it will be a sign 
of our determination!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Print stick photo of determination… Well, it's fine.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, look-look! In this photo booth, there is a “Small face 
function”! Since Hayahide always cares about the size of her 
head, isn't it okay to use this?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
What I care about is the breadth of 
my hair, not the size of my head!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ehh, Was that right? More importantly, because you can write 
anything you like, let's write “Derby”!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Why the Derby!? Next race is the “SatsukiShou” right!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, it's okay-it's okay! The 3 of us 
are running in the classic front!
